mapper.sql: areaid, areaname, pinyin, parentid, arrparentid, child, listorder, level, longitude, latitude
mapper.insert: insert into ku_city (areaid, areaname, pinyin, parentid, arrparentid, child, listorder, level, longitude, latitude, arrchildid) values (#{areaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arrparentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{child,jdbcType=BIT}, #{listorder,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{level,jdbcType=BIT}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{arrchildid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update ku_city
areaname = #{areaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
arrparentid = #{arrparentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
child = #{child,jdbcType=BIT},
listorder = #{listorder,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
level = #{level,jdbcType=BIT},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
arrchildid = #{arrchildid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where areaid = #{areaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ku_city set areaname = #{areaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, arrparentid = #{arrparentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, child = #{child,jdbcType=BIT}, listorder = #{listorder,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, level = #{level,jdbcType=BIT}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, arrchildid = #{arrchildid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where areaid = #{areaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ku_city set areaname = #{areaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, arrparentid = #{arrparentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, child = #{child,jdbcType=BIT}, listorder = #{listorder,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, level = #{level,jdbcType=BIT}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where areaid = #{areaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.areaname as startprovince,b.areaname as startcity,c.areaname as endprovince,d.areaname as endcity from ku_city a , ku_city b , ku_city c , ku_city d where b.areaid=#{startid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and b.parentid=a.areaid and d.areaid=#{endid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and d.parentid=c.areaid

select a.areaname as startprovince,b.areaname as startcity,c.areaname as starttown,d.areaname as endprovince,e.areaname as endcity,f.areaname as endtown from ku_city a , ku_city b , ku_city c , ku_city d, ku_city e , ku_city f where c.areaid=#{startid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and c.parentid=b.areaid and b.parentid =a.areaid and f.areaid=#{endid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and f.parentid=e.areaid and e.parentid =d.areaid

select a.areaname as startprovince,b.areaname as startcity,d.areaname as endprovince,e.areaname as endcity,f.areaname as endtown from ku_city a , ku_city b , ku_city d, ku_city e , ku_city f where b.areaid=#{startid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and b.parentid=a.areaid and f.areaid=#{endid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and f.parentid=e.areaid and e.parentid =d.areaid

select a.areaname as startprovince,b.areaname as startcity,c.areaname as starttown,d.areaname as endprovince,e.areaname as endcity from ku_city a , ku_city b , ku_city c , ku_city d, ku_city e where c.areaid=#{startid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and c.parentid=b.areaid and b.parentid =a.areaid and e.areaid=#{endid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and e.parentid=d.areaid and

select areaname from ku_city where areaid =(select if( 2=(select level from ku_city where areaid=(select areaid from ku_member where userid=#{1})),areaid,parentid) from ku_city where areaid=(select areaid from ku_member where userid=#{1}))
select a.areaid from ku_city a join ku_city b on a.parentid=b.areaid where b.areaname=#{0} and a.areaname=#{1}
